exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce minusP to an evaluable reference.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) l1 : list (Term A n) Unable to unify "eqP ?M1965 ?M1968 ?M1976 (pluspf ?M1966 ?M1969 ?M1975 ?M1978 ?M1982 ?M1980) (pluspf ?M1966 ?M1969 ?M1975 ?M1978 ?M1982 ?M1981)" with "eqP A eqA n (mults multA (n:=n) (invA A1, M1 n) l1) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (pO A n) (mults multA (n:=n) (invA A1, M1 n) l1))".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) l1 : list (Term A n) Unable to unify "eqP ?M1965 ?M1968 ?M1976 (pluspf ?M1966 ?M1969 ?M1975 ?M1978 ?M1980 ?M1982) (pluspf ?M1966 ?M1969 ?M1975 ?M1978 ?M1981 ?M1982)" with "eqP A eqA n l1 (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec l1 (pO A n))".

original: intros p q r H_minusP. unfold minusP in H_minusP. destruct H_minusP. - simpl. apply eqp_pluspf_com_r. - simpl. apply eqp_pluspf_com_l.
